summary: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".
cast: Christopher Lambert|Roxanne Hart|Clancy Brown|Sean Connery|Beatie Edney|Alan North|Sheila Gish|Jon Polito|Hugh Quarshie|Christopher Malcolm|Peter Diamond|Billy Hartman|James Cosmo|Celia Imrie|Alistair Findlay|Edward Wiley|James McKenna|John Cassady|Ian Reddington|Sion Tudor Owen|Damien Leake|Gordon Sterne|Ron Berglas|Louis Guss|Peter Banks|Ted Maynard|Nicola Ramsey|Waldo Roeg|Anthony Mannino|Helena Stevens|Francis Dux|Prince Howell|Anthony Fusco|Ian Tyler|Corinne Russell|Buckley Norris|Richard Bonehill|Jim Brunzell|Lisa Dalton|Sam Douglas|Sam Fatu|Harry Fielder|Greg Gagne|Terry 'Bam Bam' Gordy|Doug McLeod|Ed Montalvo|Buddy Roberts|Michael Seitz
title: Los inmortales
